[Desc]               <pink>Looking up at your opponent, you are a little terrified of the upcoming match. Facing you is "Hell's Mel" St. Claire, the infamous female bodybuilder turned wrestler. She's had an astonishing 10-0 record, and they weren't up against pipsqueaks. After beating pretty much everything she's fought against, she's decided to add this game show to her record. The crowd is clearly on her side, with her leaning forward and riling them up. While you shake hands to begin the game, she grips hard and whispers to you "Good luck out there, and hopefully you're not changed into something too embarrassing, friend".</pink>;
[LoseDesc]               <blue>Mel St. Claire, now going as Maxyne Molly, is a far cry from the macho prizefighter she came in with. Now, 'she' is the very definition of a trap, with his suspiciously flat chest and diminutive package the only indicators of his true gender. He blows kisses to the audience as he departs, with only a few brave souls returning the favour. Astonishingly, he has retained all of his previous wrestling knowledge, and still fights on his previous ranking despite his package. It always makes you smirk inside whenever you overhear how "hot" this new Maxyne Molly is, and you wonder if that thought would change if they knew what you know about what lies beneath 'her' skirt...</blue>;
